introDescription: Music Talent Discovery (MTD) is a viral promotional music talent discovery platform that provides independent talented musicians worldwide the opportunity to showcase their music talent performance to generate likes and social media popularity to potentially become the next viral sensation and get signed by the record label/producers.
App_Description1: MTD created this music viral talent awareness platform to publicly help to introduce and develop music talent career opportunities for many undiscovered music talents worldwide!
App_Description2: MTD rules and algorithms are very simple. Users are allowed to upload up to 1 minute (60 seconds) of their recorded video performance of themselves for a chance to receive  to propel them to the top of the list. The more  a user's video receives, the faster the video rises to the top of the page which gets them the attention from our networks of music producers and music label companies which gives the artist a chance to be discovered and signed! MTD also showcases and creates aggressive massive social awareness for artist video on all the social media platforms such as YouTube, Instagram, Facebook, Tiktok, and others to hype-promote the artist for a chance to get discovered and signed!
Any_cost_promote: Any Cost For MTD To Promote Music Talent?
Any_cost_Description: While MTD program is free to use, the first video upload is free of charge and there will be a small fee for each additional video upload. Users can upload any type of music genre including religious music!
question1: Are you a signed artist or under a record label contract?
question2: Are you a record company or a music producer?
que1Mess1: MTD platform only provides promotional services to unsigned and independent music artist under no contractual agreement or obligations.
que2Mess2: While MTD platform welcomes and allows all music label companies and producers to discover their next artist on our platform. However, you must abide by all our TOS which requires you to contact us via WhatsApp at +1 661 317 1485 (USA) or mtalentdiscovery@gmail.com
